```adblock
@@||stadt-bremerhaven.de^$generichide
```
to user rules.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://twitter.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2F) ### Comment Username: @felixonmars > Enabling AdGuard Adblocker completely breaks Twitter's login here. It either shows a blank popup or "An error occurred" and doesn't complete login process. With other extensions unchanged and only AdGuard Adblocker disabled for the website, the login functionality works correctly. 100% reproducible after double-checking for some time. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
Unfortunately, I cannot reproduce it.
<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29142494/210216931-d4cf9d9a-0e94-43ee-86e5-0c0d8bd10609.png)

</details>

If issue is caused by `AdGuard Tracking Protection filter` then please try to add this rule:
```adblock
@@||api.twitter.com/1.1/jot/client_event.json$domain=twitter.com
```
to user rules.

comment.body:
>You have to scroll and wait.

The problem is that I cannot scroll :upside_down_face: (until I resize window, so it's not obvious and looks like a website issue).

>But I can't reproduce, "哥，你好" in the SS will never appear in the search results probably unless you access from mainland China. Directly searching for the title shows no breakage so I have no idea about the FP.

Okay, thank you for checking it out, so I guess it can be closed for now.

```
rocketnews24.com,youpouch.com,soranews24.com#@%#//scriptlet("abort-on-property-read", "document.createElement")
rocketnews24.com,youpouch.com,soranews24.com#%#//scriptlet('prevent-element-src-loading', 'script' ,'_static')
```
work?

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете AdGuard Browser Extension, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

issue.title: GameSpot.com - Missing images (AdGuard Annoyances filter) [GDPR]
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.46.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.gamespot.com/gallery/all-fortnite-gaming-legends-series-skins-so-far/2900-4070/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected site:
`https://www.gamespot.com/`

### Issue:
Missing images, due to a blocked cookie consent, which needs to be accepted!

### Example (scroll down):
`https://www.gamespot.com/gallery/all-fortnite-gaming-legends-series-skins-so-far/2900-4070/`

### Screenshot:
Not needed, as the problem is obvious.

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Annoyances filter**

### Problem rule:
`||onetrust.com^$third-party`

### Possible fix:
`@@||geolocation.onetrust.com^$domain=gamespot.com`

### Other problem filters:
* **Easylist Cookie List** / **Fanboy's Annoyance List** https://github.com/easylist/easylist/issues/14563/
`###onetrust-banner-sdk`
`/cookieconsentpub/*`
`||onetrust.com^$third-party`

* **MVPS HOSTS**
`geolocation.onetrust.com`

### Related issue (when using CNAME uncloaking):
`https://repo.palemoon.org/Moonchild/lunarblocklist/issues/25/`

--

### System info:
* OS/version: Windows 10 Pro 21H2 (x64)
* Browser/version: LibreWolf v108.0.1-1 (x64) (Tracking Protection = Standard)
* Adblock Extension/version: uBlock Origin v1.46.0

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
